Actions.Text: REFERRED TO NEW YORK CITY EDUCATION
REFERRED TO NEW YORK CITY EDUCATION

Title: Authorizes the chancellor of the city district to control and operate certain specialized high schools in the city of New York
Summary: Authorizes the chancellor of the city district to control and operate certain specialized high schools in the city of New York; establishes a commission on middle school achievement; provides for the repeal of certain provisions upon the expiration thereof.
LawCode: Amd §§2590-a & 2590-h, Ed L; add §21-974.1, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to authorizing the chancellor of the city district to control and operate certain specialized high schools in the city of New York and to establish a commission on middle school achievement; and providing for the repeal of certain provisions upon the expiration thereof
